name: @citrineos/roamingoicp
description: The Roaming module for OICP v2.3. This module is not intended to be used directly, but rather as a dependency for other modules.

scripts.refresh-base: cd ../../00_Base && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../03_Modules/RoamingOicp && npm install ../../00_Base/citrineos-base-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.refresh-data: cd ../../01_Data && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../03_Modules/RoamingOicp && npm install ../../01_Data/citrineos-data-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.refresh-util: cd ../../02_Util && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../03_Modules/RoamingOicp && npm install ../../02_Util/citrineos-util-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.install-all: npm install ../../00_Base/citrineos-base-1.0.0.tgz && npm install ../../02_Util/citrineos-util-1.0.0.tgz && npm install ../../01_Data/citrineos-data-1.0.0.tgz

author: Stackbox GmbH
